EmailTemplate.subject: AquaFit Classes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents and Teachers,
We would like to let you know that our friends from K2Fit will be organizing 'AquaFit' classes for adults beginning this Saturday, 31st August at the BSG Swimming pool.
For contact information and further details, PLEASE CLICK HERE.
Kind Regards,
The Administration Team
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education <?xml:namespace prefix = u1 /><?xml:namespace prefix = o />
